name: El Glifo de Thumus
description:
This Game was made in 2020

El Glifo de Thumus is an adventure game in which we control Abigail, an alchemy student in her adventure to save her town from an eldrich like creature who's slowly taking control of the village. This game is only in spanish and unfortunately the project is corrupted, so I'll need time to recover it all and make an english version. It also has several bugs, but none of them are gamebreaking.

This was the first project I worked as game designer. You can see the full design document here: https://etherstorm.blogspot.com/p/documentacion-de-diseno-conceptual-de.html (also in spanish)
